ing: 1 (12 fluid ounce) can frozen lemonade concentrate
1 (12 fluid ounce) can frozen limeade concentrate
des: "The punch that packs a punch. The name describes its appearance, but the taste and potency will astound you! Great party concoction!"
ins: In a very large container, such as a cooler large plastic bucket, combine citrus soda, lemonade concentrate, limeade concentrate and alcohol. Serve with Ice.
